desc: Premium knotless hay nets designed to reduce colic, ulcers and behavioural issues in horses. Use for large round & square bales, small squares or flakes. NAG Bags slow feeders mimic natural grazing.

layout.text: At NAG Bags, we supply top-quality knotless slow hay feeders from our family to yours. We pride ourselves on creating products that are safe, effective, and affordable—products that allow you to take care of your horses in the best way possible.
